hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ "${check}" = "false" ] ; then exit 1 fi
if [ "${tags}" = "all" ] ; then if [ "${action}" = "task-check" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf --check --list-task --list-hosts elif [ "${action}" = "dry-run" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf --check elif [ "${action}" = "run" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf fi elif [ "${server}" = "inventry" ] ; then if [ "${action}" = "task-check" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -t ${tags} -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf --check --list-task --list-hosts elif [ "${action}" = "dry-run" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -t ${tags} -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf --check elif [ "${action}" = "run" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -t ${tags} -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf fi else if [ "${action}" = "task-check" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -t ${tags} -l ${server} -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf --check --list-task --list-hosts elif [ "${action}" = "dry-run" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -t ${tags} -l ${server} -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf --check elif [ "${action}" = "run" ] ; then cd /opt/sre/ansible/ && ansible-playbook -t ${tags} -l ${server} -i production -s -e target=prod site.yml --vault-password-file=/var/lib/jenkins/ansible_vault.conf fi fi
